about.details:
Sailani Tours N Travels Limited is engaged in offering Tourism and Hospitality services. The company is a travel agency and offers services like Leisure Travel, Corporate Travel, Forex and Visa Processing. Sailani Tours N Travels designs travel packages for both individuals and groups for their domestic and international leisure travel. The company make travel arrangements for corporate clients to cater to their business meetings, conferences, and events.

Sailani Tours N Travels Limited has given the franchisees to many entities located at places such as Kolkata, Guwahati, Agartala, Dhanbad, Barreilly, Varanasi, Gwalior, Indore, Ludhiana, Jalandhar, Agra, Jaipur, Rudrapur, Faridabad, Dehradun, Dalhousie, Ranchi, Siliguri, Howrah, Surat, Nagpur, Kanpur, Vidyavihar, Margao, Patna, Udaipur, Bhubaneshwar, Mulund, Pune, Jabalpur, Bhopal, Kalyaninagar, Goa, Mangalore, Malda Allahabad, Bengaluru.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Skilled & Quality Staff.
  • Product Spectrum.
  • Scalable Business Model.
  • Customer Experience.
  • Technology Infrastructure.
  • Progressive Employer.

faqs.question: What is the Sailani Tours N Travels IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sailani Tours N Travels IPO is a SME IPO of 1264000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹1.90 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹15 per share. The minimum order quantity is 8000.

The IPO opens on June 27, 2022, and closes on June 30, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sailani Tours N Travels IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sailani Tours N Travels IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sailani Tours N Travels IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sailani Tours N Travels IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sailani Tours N Travels IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sailani Tours N Travels IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sailani Tours N Travels IPO opens on June 27, 2022 and closes on June 30, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sailani Tours N Travels IPO?
faqs.answer: Sailani Tours N Travels IPO lot size is 8000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sailani Tours N Travels IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sailani Tours N Travels IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sailani Tours N Travels IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sailani Tours N Travels IPO will be done on Tuesday, July 5, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, July 7, 2022. Check the Sailani Tours N Travels IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sailani Tours N Travels IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sailani Tours N Travels IPO listing date is on Friday, July 8, 2022.
